name: Boulder Flee
description:
Tiny Dude runs for his life as he watches a giant boulder destroy the level behind him.

Features:

  • A boulder constantly follows the player
  • You can eat a mushroom to be able to sustain twice the damage
  • Zombies with axes in their head patrol the area they're placed in

The goal: RUN FOR DEAR LIFE!

Attributions:

  • Death sound: https://freesound.org/people/MentosLat/sounds/417486/
  • Coin sound: https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/341695
  • Downgrade, upgrade and jump sounds: me
